question_title: you just tell me what is love? [SEP] question_content: I don't know about love. What is love . So pls tell me what is love. [SEP] best_answer: True Love ....

It's as mysterious as the stars it was written on, as elusive. It is everything it's hyped about to be. It's worth taking every risk, it's worth fighting for, and the problem is if you don't risk all then you risk even more. Love is kind of an elixir that lures us out of reality and into the realm of fantasy. It's like a drug creating an altered state of consciousness.

Love is the moment when an unfavorable act becomes favorable, when you make excuses for some one else's mistakes, when you learn to tolerate, when you learn acceptance, when sacrificing becomes the beauty of life. 

It's the courage to tell the truth especially when you believe its unspeakable.

It's the time when seeing some one, being seen by some one and thinking about some one feels good, when you learn to find happiness in the smallest of moments.

That's love--when you learn to put down your ego and love some one more than that.

Love is forgetting your self and remembering some one else. 

Love is choosing your partner exactly as he is, and supporting him in his choices. It's honoring your partner's truth and wanting best for him.

It's not controlling or possessing but rather respecting and trusting.

It does not mean owning some one, getting some one, rather it means being happy in your loved one's happiness.

Love means living without judgments. It means treasuring your beloved and never taking him for granted. 

Love means being able to forgive and learning to give more then you get. It means reaching out when you don't want to, communicating rather than assuming and asking questions rather than jumping to conclusions.

It means working things out rather than fighting, fighting rather than leaving, and staying through the hurts and disappointments, knowing that through commitment all can be healed. 

Falling in love is like being enveloped in a magical cloud. The air feels fresher, the flowers smell sweeter, food tastes more delectable, and the stars shine more brightly at night. You feel light and lofty as though you are floating through life, and your problems and challenges suddenly seem insignificant and easily surmountable. Your body feels alive, your skin tingles and you awaken in the morning with a smile on your face. You are suspended in a state of supreme delight.

Love is a feeling and an action that arises from the most primal place within us. Making a relationship however, is a process that is learned. A relationship is the vessel that carries the precious cargo of love through time.

Relationships are like a precious antique lamp; it takes a little polish and some effort to restore it to its valuable condition. A relationships love and luster will only improve with age if you continually give it the care that keeps it beautiful. But once you uncover its essential beauty it will bring you joy for years to come.

After having said all this I want to say that you have to make the decision on your own, on one hand love is magic, on the other it's time tested relationship worked hard and furiously at.

question_title: Why.......? [SEP] question_content: ....do some people call me weird?  I have an online business, and I think it comes from knowing when I meet a freak and calling them on it, but I don't think I'm weird.  I did have counseling when I got divorced, which necessitated an evaluation (he contested the divorce), and it came out fine.  I do know I think for myself, can spot a freak in a New York minute, even on email, and am very direct, so when I call someone on something, sometimes they call me weird.  I think clearly, speak very directly and succinctly (and in general terms for the purposes of protecting my privacy at times), and read people very well.  I wonder if it's just some being pissed when I call them for what they are? [SEP] best_answer: Sometimes people think you're weird because they don't know how else to react. Being a strong, outspoken person puts people off a little bit, especially if they don't know you. They don't expect that particular reaction. You seem to have your walls built up pretty high which seems to indicate the pain you've gone through. A lot of people have been through counseling and in no way does therapy make you weird. You need to realize that other people are going to say things and you don't need to listen to them because a lot of times, people just don't have any other reaction. Be confident in who you are and you'll be fine!

question_title: have you ever seen ppl being bullied or ignored because they are asian or black? [SEP] question_content: i have seen some asian girl being ignored in the class by other white girls. do you have a similar experience and how did you feel about it? [SEP] best_answer: firstly, are you sure you're not one of those girls? Don't take offense, im not trying to insult you. It's just that you referred to her as 'some asian girl'. If you feel bad about her being ignored, that's a good thing. it means you have a heart. but just think about how she must be feeling. Try talking to her, be nice to her. Mind u, i'm not saying to be nice out of pity. but if you never try speaking to her, you may never know what sort of a friend you're missing out on.\nAt my school, we had a lot of international students from the asian region. They could all speak english pretty well, but they tended to keep to themselves. But i still spoke to some of them and some of them ended up becoming quite good friends of mine. Don't be afraid to break through the barriers. loneliness is one of the saddest things a person has to face. There is too much going on in this world for us to tolerate racism. It's when we allow racism to succeed that we get events like the Holocaust, and the Stallinist purges.\nReach out to her. She's human too, and for all you know, friendship from you could be just what she needs. Never underestimate the need for friendship. Don't worry about what other people think of you if you do this. Being nice to someone has its own rewards, and it's the right thing to do.

I understand just how he feels. I have this friend that "sweet" talks and when I turn around he gets beat up by another girl.

This is the answer. You hook him up with someone. Tell him how funny, sensitive or sweet he is with another girl to make her go out with him. You'll see how that will change in anything.

question_title: i need help about a guy i just started talking to? [SEP] question_content: ok i just started talking to this guy i really like him so far he seems to be everything im looking for,family,wounting more kids,not hanging out,cuddling,things like that but he some time wount call me back or when he dose if he gets mad he will jus t say im hanging up ,and hang up.or if we are on the im he will just hang up what should i do how to tell if he really is serious about this ,i have asked him and he sayes he wounts to be with me and that he is serious but how can i really tell [SEP] best_answer: It is so obvious that he has no respect for you. Luckily you just started talking to him so it will be easy for you to stop talking to him. How can you "really like him" if he doesn't call you back, hang up on you on the phone and IM, blah, blah, blah. If he really liked you, he wouldn't be doing those things. He sounds mean. He's lying when he says he wants to be with you. You don't want to be with someone who is already like that when you just started talking. What more will he do if you let it go on longer?

I don't mean to hurt your feelings. But it's easier for someone on the outside to really see what is going on.

Any guy who really, I mean really likes a girl will do anything to make her happy. Men want to make women happy. If you're not happy, he's not the right one. I wouldn't be happy if anyone (whether it's my fiance, or boyfriend, or husband, or friend) hangs up on me. It is disrespectful.

You need to have higher standards.

question_title: I am a married 43yr old married woman who haqs lost her sex drive can anybody help me? serious question? [SEP] question_content: I hve been married for 2oyrs some good some bad not sure if i am post menaporsel [SEP] best_answer: You are probably near menopause, and this is normal.  You are a little past your prime (30's something), and your hormones are doing a number on your libido.  Don't worry.  Talk to your spouse about it for support.  Maybe you're feeling unattractive.  Feeling attractive can make you feel incredibly sensual.  Go get a massage at a spa.  Get a make over.  Some new bras and panties.  Something they'll remind you that you are still a force to be reckoned with.  Remember Demi Moore is in her 40's and has Ashton Cutcher doing his thing with her.  You can remain a sexual person all the way up into your ninety's.  It's all in your mind.  I recommend just standing alone naked in a mirror, and see your self being pleasing and pleased with the one you love.  You first have to know what's going on with you sexually.  You can also talk to your doctor, but I wouldn't recommend meds, because of all the stinky side affects.  I hope you continue your journey as a sexy, beautiful woman.

question_title: My wife suffers from anixety.  How can I be helpful to her and understand her in this state? [SEP] question_content: We have been married for 13 years. I have suffered from depression. We both have medical help for our illness. What really would be helpful from a spouse when you suffer anixety? [SEP] best_answer: I have anxiety and my husband doesn't suffer from anything...You have a head start...depression is somewhat like anxiety. If she is a girly-girl (like me), give her a good amount of affection, all the while telling and re-telling her that you love her. Sometimes, if my husband's voice is very calm and loving, it will calm me down. She just needs to know that you are there for her. And don't do like my husband and think it's funny for her to freak out so you egg it on. Simply telling her everything is going to be okay...isn't enough. If she starts freaking out too much, just hold her...that's a soothing thing to do. It has been proven to relieve stress. I hope this helps.

question_title: Can someone please help me out? [SEP] question_content: Ok so in the past I have wanted to be a teacher and my parents and family have been so proud of me making that decision and getting the grades and everything I even used to play school when I was younger. Now I have decided I want to become an actress but I really dont think my family supports my decision since they all want me to be a teacher. I dont think they believe I can do it but I really want to prove them wrong. I hate to disappoint my family and friends but this is my dream now and my friends say to follow my heart and my heart says to go out there and do the best I can and work on becoming an actress. I'm really confused and it hurts that my family wont support my desicion. What should I do? [SEP] best_answer: Oh dear. A classic case of keep the family happy or follow the dream. Of course you must follow your heart. Your parents have probably been talking for years about your good grades and the dreams they had for you. Our desires alter as we grow and change. What was right for you up to recently may not be right for you any more. That's fine. That's life. Your family are disappointed, because they were focusing thier hopes and dreams on only you; what matters are your hopes and dreams. Give them time, they sound lovely, and very likely will come round. They will be as proud of you as an actress as they would have been as a teacher. I think they'd be proud of you anyway.

question_title: Ladies over 22 please help!? [SEP] question_content: I have known this girl for two years, she’s 34 and I’m 30. She lives about an hour away. We went out a couple of times awhile back. First time she had an old friend get in the way, and they pursued a relationship. The second time she indicated that if I lived closer she would pursue a relationship but didn't want a long distance relationship. We kept in touch and emailed almost daily, pretty much excessively as many as 20 times a day (considering we both have office jobs, that wass pushing it I think). About 3 months ago I told her (casually) that I was seeing somebody. She immediately suggested that she was coming to my town and wanted to hang out for awhile. We did. She asked how things were going with the g/f, and I told her they were ok and that we were reaching the make or break point of the relationship. I asked her if she was seeing somebody, and she hesitated (what does the hesitation mean) before saying that she had been seeing somebody for a year. I told her I was happy for her. We had a nice innocent time together. On that following Monday I emailed her and said that I was happy for her that things were going well for her. It’s been a month and she hasn’t really kept in touch at all, not like she used to. Any ideas on what her intentions were and what the heck she is thinking now? Thanks gals, I appreiciate it [SEP] best_answer: Well she may be moving on she already stated she don't want a long distance relationship, and know that you have a "girlfriend" she may be trying to find her own that pause mean she has been dating but nothing serious.  But you opened up the possibility she can find someone too. You guys are good friends but I think the time isn't right for the both of you.  Not to say if you visit her she want come see you or vice versa, but i don't know what's going on in HER mind she would have to tell you that and just ask ! Email her and ask her for her honest opinion if you want more from her then you both can come to an agreement of what this relationship is truly going to be just friends or lovers!!!

question_title: i really2x wanna know the best way to get many friends..? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: Hi Shady, I hope you don't take this in the wrong way, but I also have seen (and answered) your questions on weight loss as well. I am becoming concerned for you, look, life is not about being the most beautiful, or the most popular. Only very shallow people obsess over these things. I am concerned that you may have an unhealthy view of yourself, which may bring you to harm, if not physically, then possibly mentally. A few tips: 
1: there are no physically ugly people in this world, only attitude ugly people,
2: You do not need a lot of friends, I personally only have about 4 really close friends who I love and cherish very much and I know if the chips were down, then I could rely upon them, whereas if you have hundreds of friends, then to each of them you are worth 1/100th of their love and respect,
3: If people do not love, respect and admire you for who you are (personally and physically), then they are not your friends and do not deserve the time and effort you are obviously willing to put into making them like you.

question_title: My ex is leaving in 5 days, it'll be hard on my daughter and me...advice? [SEP] question_content: I just moved to 2000 miles away from my old home. My ex came along for the drive cuz I drove cross country with our daughter and a lotta cash. Now he's leavin in 5 days and super depressed about it. I know he's goanna miss her but he has to go. I'm goanna miss him. I love him but with circumstances it just won't work out. Is there anything any of you can advise to make the separation easier on all of us? He's going 2000 miles away and very anxious as to when he'll see our daughter again. And she's going to take it very hard looking for daddy and he won't be there...any thoughts? [SEP] best_answer: Hi Dakota:
So sorry to hear all your pain.....but the good part of this is I hear lots, and lots of love going on here.  Wow.  Glad to hear it...and keep it up.  

Don't worry.  Keep busy with some other passion, other then him, and all will be fine.   I discovered all sorts of interesting passions when I was alone.....I actually started to really find me and my daughter, and we had lots of fun, and when my love came back, well he was really happy to see the 'new' me.  I had matured and become 'more' attractive to him because I had another passion.  and our daughter learned from seeing me function and find myself more steady!  She is now much older, but she is very independent now as a result.

It is hard, and I know you can do it, because lots of us out there did what you are doing.   So, dive out on the internet and look up some of your passions--be it painting, walking, hiking, drawing, find something fast.  and your honey will appreciate you all that much more.

Trust me on this one,

luv Ava

question_title: Is this the correct thing to do? [SEP] question_content: Two weeks ago I confronted my boyfriend about txt msgs he had been recieving on his cell.  He told me who they were from.  He was being sneaky about the msgs, hiding it from me.  But when I confronted him he told me everything.  He asked me if I wanted him to stop talking to her he would.  I told him the next morning that I wanted him to stop talking to her.  For the past two weeks I havent seen her send him a txt msg with the exception of last night.  She sent him one and he lied to me about it.  I only know this because I checked his cell this morning.  I confronted him about it and he told me that he has gotten msgs from her but hasnt responded.  Then he told me that she had sent him an email, a RiverSongs greeting.  He kept that, didnt delete it.  Do you think that it would be bad of me to email her and tell her that I am my boyfriends girlfriend and that we are expecting twins and that I wish she would stop emailing him and txting him? [SEP] best_answer: I don't think it's good for you to contact women through your mans' means of communication.

This isn't a problem with the woman, it's actually your man. He's responsible for what he does. 

I know you won't check me as 'best answer', but I'm telling you right now, he isn't trying that hard to keep you. You are having twins with him and you two haven't tied the knot. I'm guessing that if he asked you, you'd be ecstatic, right? 

Step outside from your body for one second and take a look at this picture:
There is this woman who wants this man. They get together and have the boyfriend/gf title for ages... she gets pregnant. They remain unmarried. Now there is another woman texting msgs to this father-to-be. The gf gets jealous and protective of her relationship with this man and their children to be...
-questions: Wouldn't a man who was very devoted make this right and concrete for the sake of his woman and his children... and get a marriage certificate? Why does this other woman have his #? Why did the gf allow herself to become pregnant with this man's children with no true contract or guarantee of relationship and put their future children in this position?

People who give advice about getting your stuff straight  when starting things like families give it because they want things to go smoothly for you.. not cause problems like the ones you are having. Sure, your man is probably lovable and an all around ok guy... but so what? You are having this problem, and the only one that can fix it is him.

I don't mean to send out a bitch answer like this, but I hear this stuff all the time from people like my cousins. WHY do us women get pregnant and just HOPE it'll all work out... then complain to others when it doesn't? We all lie in the beds we make. Your #1 obligation now, is your children. Your man isn't a winner.

So to answer your question, again, don't email her. She isn't the problem... regardless of any lack of respect which she may have for his future children's lives. The problem is him and he should fix it. The real underlying problem is the foundation which you two built and somehow deemed fit to start a family on.

question_title: How can tell my boyfriend I'm not in the mood....? [SEP] question_content: He's so hot..He's always on the go. But sometimes I don't feel like doing it. How can tell without hurting his ego? [SEP] best_answer: Sometimes a significant other needs to understand that there are two important people in a relationship, not just one.  If he is a worthy boyfriend he will find a matue way of accepting your needs and desires, even if those needs slow him down a little.  It's certainly not an unreasonable request you have.  Reading between the lines of your letter (if that's possible) I sense that between the two of you, you tend to give more importance to the other person's ego, needs, etc, than your own.  Men can sense that and men will take advantage of some ladies if you continually put him first and you last.  I would rethink your positioning in the relationship and not feel guilty about imposing you own rules, desires, comfort level needs.

question_title: are you considered bi if u fall in love w/your bf and can't control yr feelings,1st time it happen? [SEP] question_content: we have been friends for a while were apart for 7yrs and now closer than ever I fell in lv w/her first I never thought I would with the same sex.I've been in lv before w/men I am 40 and this is all new to me I was not raised to be like this but can't control my heart.we get along so great better than w/our own mates.who we talk about a lot and we get treated bad fr them.she has told me she wants to be held&kissed but don't wanna start a new relasp w/someone else and get hurt again.we see each other a lot and sometimes when we look into each others eyes nothing else matters I wake up thinking about her and all day until I go to sleep.our mates are out of town and we are both lonely.she has told me she trust me more than anybody else she knows how I feel and in my heart I know she feels at least something more we have told each other we loved each other many times but says she feels our frdsh is like sisters or good friends but the signs she gave me I know is more than that.isTHSDENEIL? [SEP] best_answer: Hi angel. I am sorry that you are going through a tough time with your mate, and that your friend is also. 

I want to start by warning you that I am a lesbian, so I may be a bit biased on this matter. If you are looking for opinions from straight people, feel free to move on.

It sounds a lot like you are feeling real emotions and a connection with your friend. I can't tell without meeting her whether she is feeling the same way about you, but I would definitely suggest following your heart. Don't let society's ideas keep you from doing what your heart tells you is right.

I would suggest not just coming out and saying "I want to be with you", or by kissing her. You really dont want to destroy the wonderful friendship that you have.

An example of a more subtle way, would be this: Next time you are talking together, and you are discussing your troubles with your mates, find a way to give her a hug, and hold the hug for a good bit longer than you need to. Then, pull back and look her in the eyes with tears in your own eyes, and a smile on your face, and just say. "Thanks, I needed that, and I love you." Then, hold her gaze with your own, and see what her reaction is.

This way, if she has no feelings for you in that way, she is free to consider it as simply an in-need-of-comfort hug, and she won't be insulted by the action. However, if she is feeling the same way, she shouldn't be able to resist the eye-to-eye look you will be giving her, and she will kiss you.

I hope you have a wonderful experience with your friend, and whatever happens, please don't let your friendship suffer.

question_title: What do I need to get done to create my own dojo/ryu (Jujitsu) ? [SEP] question_content: Planning on getting my black belt in Fuji Ryu Jujitsu and adding aiki techniques and naming it a different type of ryu (Fuji Ryu Aiki Jujitsu or something similiar to that) with Shihan's approval.

www.el-aminryu.com [SEP] best_answer: Ah, but are any of us ever more than just masters of the basics?  I would say it all the depends on the individual in question.  How long have you trained and what it is your educational background?  Do you have knowledge of the business side of things?  Do you have a business license?

I (only) have a single black belt, but I have been training in various martial arts systems for over 17 years.  Does that mean that I have not mastered more than "the basics"?  Am I one of those people who train and train but "never seem to get anywhere"?  Maybe, maybe not.

I have taught martial arts only as private lessons.  But I have assisted in countless demonstrations, seminars and training camps for my teacher.  It would appear that at first glance I still have not "acheived" the privilege of opening my own school.

However, I have two college degrees, and have been a public school teacher for 12 years.  And if I have learned anything through all of my experiences, it's that being a successful martials instructor has as much to do with business acumen as it does with knowing the lore of the art.

Who is to say who is ready?  Only the individual can truly say.  All one really needs to do is to apply all that training that has gone before to the goals now set in sight.  90% of all martial arts training is a contingency plan (what do you do if...?).  So what are the contingencies of running a business?  Answer that and you should be ready.

Best of Luck.  I hope to be in that position myself in the near future.

VT

get a book on stretching your body. you need to beable to do the splits and toes touches and the very impotent hurkey! and also get a book on just cheerleading! i LOVE LOVE LOVE! the book: the ultimate guide to cheerleading! by leslie wilson. look for it at the library! and it has EVERYTHING YOU WILL EVER NEED TO KNOW ABOUT IT! cool huh?

so you have to know how to do all of these to be ready to go to tryouts. summersalt, kartwheel,hand stand (if not it's ok but it's very good to know how to do a hand stand to learn a back hand spring!) roundoff,head stand,splits, toe touch (and it helps to know the splits to do a toe touch) hurkey, and ect. as much as you can learn. 

make up cheers and a routine. and go over them.get a book on cheers. 

ask some cheerleaders at your schools what it takes to be a cheerleader. they can help you. are better yet ask the cheerleading coach. she can really get you going!

remember that cheering is serious and you can get hurt while stunting. so always use your head when cheering and donn't do anything at home like trying to lift your little sis into a lift with you down on the base with your brother!

so jsut do all of that and you will be great! good luck!

question_title: what are the benefits of martial art to yourself? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: I just picked up an article from a web site regarding the benefits of martial arts,hope this article can answer your question promptly.
What are Martial Arts?
Most of us are familiar with the term martial arts, whether it be from personal experience or from watching television shows or movies featuring the moves of this dazzling sport. Technically defined, martial arts are systems of combat and self-defense. Developed in various countries including China, Korea, Indonesia, and the Philippines, martial arts systems have been around for centuries. Martial arts are now becoming more and more popular, especially amongst North Americans. Practiced not only as a way to learn self defense, martial arts allows followers to increase personal fitness, reduce stress, and improve mental health.

Health Benefits of Martial Arts
Martial arts aren’t just about self-defense anymore, although this can still be a major benefit to practicing these sports. Instead, more and more men and women are turning to martial arts because of the vast array of health benefits associated with these fitness systems. Some of the health benefits that regular practice of a martial art can bring you include:


increased muscle strength 
heightened stamina 
weight loss and weight maintenance 
improved flexibility 
better posture and balance 
improved agility

When combined with a healthy diet, regular practice of a martial art can even help to lower your risk of cardiovascular disease. But the benefits of martial arts aren’t just physical – these sports also work wonders for your mental and emotional wellbeing, helping to:


reduce stress 
improve concentration 
increase self confidence

What Is Involved in Martial Arts?
Each system of martial arts is different, however, most combine some of the following features:


Forms: Most martial arts involve the practice of various forms, which are poses or movements performed in a routine. These routines can be practiced alone or with a partner and may involve kicking, jumping, or punching. Forms are typically non-combative. 
Sparring Most martial arts feature some type of sparring, whether it be light, moderate, or heavy contact. Sparring involves fighting with an opponent while protected with foam padding and other protective gear. 
Self Defense: The major goal of most martial arts systems is self-defense. The moves that you will learn will increase your ability to defend yourself against another person’s advances, and help you to deal with physical confrontation.


Types of Martial Arts
There are dozens of different martial arts systems that you can become involved with. Here are a few of the most popular martial arts:

Karate
Karate is perhaps the most well known of all the martial arts systems. It is also the most widely-practiced martial art in North America. Originating on the island of Okinawa in Japan, karate literally means "open hand." This is because all of the movements involved in karate use the hand as the main weapon. In karate, participants focus all of their energy into one contact point in order to overcome their opponent. Most karate movements involve striking with the hands, feet, or elbows, however, the sport also involves some grappling. Karate is excellent for those who want to increase their overall fitness levels and improve their upper body strength and fitness.

Judo
Judo was derived from the martial arts system, Jujutso, and literally means the "gentle way." Judo teaches students how to use the strength and ability of their opponents in order to win the advantage in a match. It typically involves grappling, throwing, and rolling the opponent. Judo is excellent for those who are looking to improve their fitness levels without bulking up too much. It is particularly well-suited to women and people of smaller physical stature.

Taekwondo
Taekwondo was created in Korea in the 1950s as an offshoot of karate. It emphasizes kicking t

question_title: Where are the cards and pad kept? [SEP] question_content: In the USA vs. Italy match I saw that he has his red card in his left breast pocket. I am guessing he has his yellow card in his right breast pocket. Where do they keep their match pad?

(resubmitted after posted in wrong category) [SEP] best_answer: You can put it where ever you like. Cards today can be written on as opposed to the past.
Some refs keep both cards together, some keep the red in the back shorts packet, some in the left breast.

It doesn't really matter, so long the individual remembers where he put it. Even if he forgets, it makes no difference, you can always check before pulling out the card.

The famous Dutch referee Mario van der Ende, usually kept both cards together. Whence a foul was committed, everyone will be in suspense as he takes both cards out and then only, flashes the yellow. The look of relief on the offender's face, adds spice to the game.

question_title: I would like to get into the martial arts but one that does not require years of practice can anyone help me.? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: There are a few things that you need to be aware of before going down this path. There are lots of people who will try to convince you that system X or system Y are the most effective, and that you can learn these systems in days or weeks. Not to put too fine a point on it, but these claims are utter horse poopoo. If you want to be skilled in a system, it is going to require some effort on your part. That being said, it is quite possible to become quite effective in relatively short order IF AND ONLY IF you are willing to put in the effort to get there. Also, before I go any further, please understand, I'm not saying these systems are better than others. Some systems have a different focus than others. That's not better, it is just different. Much like comparing apples and bananas, one isn't better than the other, they're just different.

Ok, with that out of the way, let's dig into the meat of your question. The first thing you need to decide is what is  it you want to get out of it? Are you looking to be able to protect yourself and others quickly and effectively? Or are you interested in competing in full contact fighting? Or are you just interested in doing it for yourself because it is something you think you'd enjoy? How you answer the above questions will dictate to some degree the best answer for you. 

If you are strictly interested in effective self defense, there are some suggestions that I would make based on my personal experience. The Filipino systems of Kali, Escrima, and Arnis really hit the ground running, so to speak. They, along with the countless flavors of Indonesian Pencak Silat (pronounced pent-jahk see-laht), and some of the Chinese systems such as Wing Chun, Chung-I Chuan, and San Soo, are very much focused on turning you into a multi-faceted fighter in relatively short order. I prefer these systems because they don't focus on just one particular area. They incorporate bare hand techniques, weapon techniques (sticks and daggers are particularly common), and grappling techniques. If you are interested in primarily bare hand techniques, you could also include Muay Thai (aka Thai boxing). The big difference between these systems and similar systems is their overall philosophy. One of the systems that I do personally is Taiji Quan. Very, very effective combat system. However, the guiding philosophy is that they expect that you'll be studying Taiji for the rest of your life. As a result, though you do become extremely effective in combat, it comes with time and isn't a major focus from the start. The systems I mention above, though, focus on making you at least competent in as short of a time as possible. 

If you are interested in full contact fighting, then I would recommend going in the direction of something like Shootfighting or Brazillian Jiujitsu (aka Gracie Jiujistu). I've known people who practiced both of these styles and can attest to the fact that they became relatively skilled rather quickly. The big distinction between these styles and the first group of styles that I mentioned is that the self defense oriented styles include many, many techniques that would be patently illegal in full contact fighting. 

I hope this provides some information that you will find useful. Again, I can't advise you strongly enough to avoid the systems that will tell you that they will teach you to become a whirlwind of death in 30 days or similar nonsense. Anything worth doing takes effort and practice, and if it was easy, everyone would do it. I've spent most of my life in the martial arts, and I wouldn't trade it for anything. It has been a great experience for me, and I hope it will be for you, too. Good luck!

Harry Carson - Linebacker - 1976-1988 New York Giants
L.C. Greenwood - Defensive End - 1969-1981 Pittsburgh Steelers
Russ Grimm - Guard - 1981-1991 Washington Redskins
Claude Humphrey - Defensive End - 1968-1978 Atlanta Falcons, 1979-1981 Philadelphia Eagles (injured reserve - 1975)
Michael Irvin - Wide Receiver - 1988-1999 Dallas Cowboys
Bob Kuechenberg - Guard - 1970-1984 Miami Dolphins (injured reserve - 1984)
John Madden - Coach - 1969-1978 Oakland Raiders
Art Monk - Wide Receiver - 1980-1993 Washington Redskins, 1994 New York Jets, 1995 Philadelphia Eagles
Warren Moon - Quarterback - 1984-1993 Houston Oilers, 1994-1996 Minnesota Vikings, 1997-1998 Seattle Seahawks, 1999-2000 Kansas City Chiefs
Derrick Thomas - Linebacker - 1989-1999 Kansas City Chiefs
Thurman Thomas - Running Back - 1988-1999 Buffalo Bills, 2000 Miami Dolphins

question_title: I purchsed a Taylor Made driver a while back and discovered some thing is loose in side the head.  Need help.? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: This has happened to me a few times. 

The "thing" loose inside the head is a piece of the epoxy broken off and just rattling around in there. It won't hurt anything, it's just kind of annoying. 

Back in the old days I drilled a small hole in the back of my driver and shot some expanding foam in there....that worked then, however I don't think it will work now. 

You can take it to a PGA pro and they can take the head off and shake out your little rascal, but my advice would be to just leave it in there and keep on slappin it!

question_title: tony stewart has a minimal fracture in his right  scapula. will he miss any races? [SEP] question_content: just curious [SEP] best_answer: I don't know much about racing but I know a little about broken bones.  Fracturing your scapula is hard to do and requires a very forceful collision.  Unfortunately much shoulder movement will be painful.  It is a stable fracture.  Driving a race car requires a lot of shoulder movement.  They may be able to brace him, but if I were a betting man I would think he will be out for six to eight weeks.

question_title: range of motion of a track runner? [SEP] question_content: want to know the range of motion of a track runner and the muscle that begin used in this [SEP] best_answer: Depending on the event. I'll do sprinting,100m, range of motion/centre of mass includes and is achieved through a combination of stride rate and stride length.the mechanics of correct sprint posture the forward lean with the head and shoulders directly above the hips, the ball of the foot should strike the ground creating foot flexion, which allows the calves to contract creating knee lift which incorporates the quads, hams, and glutes. It depends greatly on the athlete and which race they are running. Sprints, middle distance, and distance as well as hurdles all involve very different forms of running and different ranges of motion.:-)

question_title: How do you condition yourself and your body for Track & Field? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: I ran track and field and cross-country year round for three years. You have to condition yourself for three things: the stress on your body, the stress due to time management, and the stress on your nerves at meets.

The best way to condition your body is to have a good coach and to have open communication with him. Also, someone who is close to your skill level (or better) to train with is a necessity for both safety and to improve. Make sure that you have a balanced diet, sleep enough, don't smoke and keep drinking down to a minimum. Drink a LOT of water. 

If you're in high school or university, you'll find it difficult to keep up with school work and maintain a social life when you're concentrating on track. Let your teachers know that you're on the team; not that you can expect them to treat you differently, but you should always let them know when you'll be out of class or late for sport events. Surround yourself with people who are supportive and understand that you want to succeed, and that it will take time and effort.

I never really succeeded in overcoming my nerves. I would cry, throw up and pass out at track meets. There are so many people; so much is going on; the starter's gun is going off, people are running around. The best thing to do is realize that you're prepared, you are fully capable of doing it, and it will all be over soon.

By the way, which event are you running? I did the 400m and the 800m, so if you're doing pole vault or javelin, my answer may not be too helpful. Good luck!

question_title: what is wrong with WWE............? [SEP] question_content: what the fuck is wrong with WWE?Why they r constantly bringing new faces and pushing them making the old ones job to them?
Kane has been used as a jobber recently.He deserves to b the World champ or at least a maineventer.But they r making him loose to MVP every week. They tell that WWE is a fans show then 
why dont they give the fans what they want to see?????Moreover Benoit is holding a mid card championship.Why????The same guy that was part of the mainevent at WM 20,is being used as a midcarder now.How stupid Vince and the board is.Kane,Benoit and Undertaker also helped Vince to win the Monday Night Wars and now he is using them to put the young guys get over????Why??They consider Batista as their big draw -good.They didnt know how to use Lashley,Terkay and Khali.So they were send to ECW.Isnt this disgusting????Do u agree with me.Give your own point of view... [SEP] best_answer: 2nd shift guy, it's called tivo, or a vcr...get one and start taping.  I work the third shift and tivo is my best friend~

Onto the issue:
I think we have to severly grasp the inevitable here...Kane, like Undertaker and Benoit are on track to retire within at least 5 years top.  Wrestling has evolved over the years and wrestlers take more physical aggrevation than wrestlers of the past (in my opinion).  I believe that soon Undertaker will retire, which is what I thought was happening when they brought in Khali...I thought he would be the new phenom.  I don't think it's that they don't know how to use Lashley or Terkay or Khali rather they are trying to get these people a different exposure and more time on the camera so that people can begin to notice them better.  I mean who doesn't want to see Khali go up against Big Show??  Terkay against Lashley for the ECW Gold?? In a TLC Match??? Oh man, the possibilites are endless with ECW because of their phenomenal stipulations!  
On the whole Kane vs. MVP vs. UMAGA situation, I see this as a storyline that's gearing up to get Kane's character to a whole new level.  I feel that someone is will address to Kane that he used to be feared and monstrous and that because of the cheap wins by MVP and twice beaten by UMAGA is becoming unfeared which will lead to Kane to go on a sabbatical and return as the true Kane Mask and all!  At least I hope that's what's going to happen because all of these cheap wins by MVP are dissapointing!
Also, it wasn't just Kane and Undertaker that helped Vince win the Monday night wars (Benoit couldn't have helped by the way since he was WCW when Monday Night Wars were critical!), it was the evolution of DX, the Charisma of The Rock, and Mick Foley and Eric Bischoff (which by the way these two were the ones really responsible for WWE to win the Monday Night Wars, which I'll expain in a statement below) and of course STONE COLD STEVE AUSTIN!  
The new faces that are being pushed are to attract new viewers and the younger generation and I have to agree that Vince is doing what is necessary for us to continue to have programming of the WWE and to have it on basic cable~

"The Cure"
KeMo

www.angelfire.com/crazy/bwa

PS: ***Further explaination on Mankind and Eric Bischoff being the real reason for winning Monday Night Wars for WWE***:

January 1999, the WWF had begun catching up to WCW in the ratings. On January 4, 1999, a live Nitro was scheduled to air alongside a taped edition of RAW. (Wow does anyone remember when they used to do taped editions??LOL)

During what was likely the most competitive night in the "Monday Night Wars," Bischoff instructed Tony Schiavone to remark, "And we understand that Mick Foley, who once wrestled for us as Cactus Jack, is going to win their world title. Huh! That should put some butts in the seats." Bischoff's intention was to spoil the main event, causing fans to lose interest in RAW and stay tuned in to Nitro. Instead, there was a significant backlash; Nielsen Ratings showed that within minutes of the announcement, nearly 300,000 Nitro viewers switched the channel to RAW so they could see the title change (WCW had been ahead in the ratings until Schiavone's remark). Although both shows broke quarter-hour ratings records that night, and Nitro beat five of RAW's quarter hours, it proved to be a decisive turning point in the "Wars" (even though Nitro ratings were still very solid, in the 4.5-5.0 range, Nitro never again beat RAW in the ratings).

question_title: How did the World Cup originate? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: A group of visionary French football administrators, led in the 1920s by the innovative Jules Rimet, are credited with the original idea of bringing the world's strongest national football teams together to compete for the title of World Champions. The original gold trophy bore Jules Rimet's name and was contested three times in the 1930s, before the Second World War put a 12-year stop to the competition.\nHeld since 1958 alternately in Europe and the Americas, the World Cup broke new ground with the Executive Committee's decision in May 1996 to select Korea and Japan as co-hosts for the 2002 edition.

question_title: is it safe to be in a tent while it's storming/lightening? [SEP] question_content: Going camping, slight chance of pop up t'storm.  Is it safe to hide in the tent while this goes on?  Seen it in movies but that is a movie! Just generally thinking, metal poles, electricity, I am just not sure.  If you say yea it's ok please tell me why. thanks [SEP] best_answer: Actually, in the great outdoors, it doesn't really matter where you are.  You may be sheltered from the rain, but lightning is always another factor.  Though the chances of you (yourself) being struck by lightning is very slim to none...you can't rule out the possibility of it striking a tree, for example, and running through the ground and hitting you that way.\n\nThey say that the best thing to do while camping and sheltering in a tent is NOT to lay down to avoid exposure to ground currents.  You also want to be away from the tallest things around you, however, you do not want to be the tallest thing around.  If you are in an exposed site (i.e.no trees)that would make your tent probably the tallest thing around you.  In which case you should abandon everything and get somewhere (such as your car) that provides better shelter.

question_title: Who is a better overall basketball player, Dwyane Wade or Kobe Bryant? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: Overall, Kobe Bryant is a better player.  

Wade is awesome at getting to the basket and has his midrange bank shot.  He's also a bit quicker than Kobe, but thats about it.

Bryant has been one of the best defensive guards in the league for many years.  Wade's good but no where close to how clutch Kobe is (how many 3's has Wade made while being triple teamed in the last second?).  Kobe also has a better midrange and 3pt shot than Wade; overall he has a bigger selection of shots and moves to choose from.  Bryant is a better floor general, and seems to have a bigger desire to win.

Bryant also has more NBA experience than Wade will have, since he started when he was 17-18 years old.  I've watched Bryant hitting shots while being Quadruple teamed (hitting shots while double teamed almost the whole game).  The whole Series between Dallas and Miami, whenever Wade got double teamed by Harris, Howard, or Terry he couldn't make squat.

question_title: Is there any credit cards for REALLY bad credit? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: Yes.

You are looking for a secured credit card.

A secured credit card is on if which you put a security deposit and charge against it. Most finical institutions who issue secured credit card charge noticeable monthly or annual fees.

Example:
You put down a $200 security deposit.
You get a credit card with a $200 limit.


A secured credit card may be the best way to repair a bad credit history. It will take a while, but if you pay on time, your credit will get better.

If you just need credit card convince, but don't care about your credit, try looking for a pre-paid credit card. You can get these from most local banks.

question_title: What's the best way to market a business computer consulting/support business? [SEP] question_content: The business does onsite and remote support, software sales, printer & accessory sales, security product sales.  What's the most effective way to get the attention of businesses. [SEP] best_answer: Have you thought about pay per click programs? The two biggest, I think, are Yahoo! and Google

A few free resources – check out the sources box for links:

1) Create a blog pertaining to your field

2) Use Yahoo! Local & Yahoo! Groups – Be sure to read the TOS for each one! 

3) Write articles pertaining to your field and/or expertise.

4) Advertise on Craiglist 

Also, consider signing up for an affiliate program. These programs enable you to advertise on other's sites (your affiliates) and once a sale is made to you, your affiliates & the program are paid a commission. 

I listed a few handy sites & articles relating to marketing, promotion & advertising. Here are some book titles that are relevant:

* The Complete Idiot's Guide to Marketing Basics by Sarah White
* The 22 Immutable Laws of Marketing by Al Ries, Jack Trout
* Creative Advertising: Ideas and Techniques from the World's Best Campaigns by Mario Pricken
* Entrepreneur Magazine's Ultimate Small Business Marketing Guide: Over 1500 Great Marketing Tricks That Will Drive Your Business Through the Roof by James Stephenson
* 301 Do-It-Yourself Marketing Ideas: From America's Most Innovative Small Companies by Sam Decker

Hope that helps! I wish you much success & happiness in all your ventures!

question_title: how much does walmart pay thier employees? [SEP] question_content: im just curious. [SEP] best_answer: it varies, depending on where they are located and what jobs the employees do.

Where I live, they get minimum wage to start, but can get a small raise if they stay for more than 6 months.  
Where they really screw their workers, though, is on hours they work.  Here, they wont let anyone work more than 24 hours a week, which means they dont have to provide any benefits like health care.  But they expect you to be available at any time to work any shift as needed.

question_title: How to open dispatching company? [SEP] question_content: I want to open family run business and I want to know how. I do have some experience in trucking industry, but not in dispaching in trucking. I have been dispacher for national pizza chain in southwest region, had 21 driwer and 4 stores. What kind of forms and licences I have to have to be abble to functioning as independent dispacher(s)? I do have good relationships with 4 owner/operators in my area and one brooker from neighboring town. What else you recomend to "have to have" in my case?\nI realy appreciate efforts to help me and my family. I legaly imigrated in US 14 years ago and I am hard worker and fast learner. [SEP] best_answer: Dispatch for what type of transportation? You talk about pizza delivery, and for that I can not help you. You also talk about a broker and owner operators, which is heavy haul trucking. For this you will need your DOT authority. You can not "just dispatch", you will need to operate under your own, or another person or company's authority. If you want your own operating authority, there are many services that will help you get this for a reasonable fee. You will still need the money to pay the owner operators, advances for fuel, insurance ($750,000 to $1,500,000, depending on what type of operation you will run) and various other things. You REALLY need to know the business before you jump in. It has a very high failure rate for several reasons. 1. Under capitalized 2. This business is full of individuals that do not operate ethically. If you are not careful, your money will be gone, and they will still be operating, with someone else they can take advantage of.

question_title: How do multiple credit card payments impact credit reports? [SEP] question_content: Right now, I pay more than the mimimum on all of my credit cards.  However, with the ease of online banking and my cash flow cycle, I always make multiple payments, about 2 - 4 times each month.  When a credit report is pulled and shows the last payment I made on an account (assuming it was the month prior), does it show the actual amount of the last payment -- which may be $30 -- or the total of all payments over the course of the month, which is more along the lines of $300? [SEP] best_answer: No, all it show is what the minimum payment is and the new balance.  Balances are what is important if you are concerned with your credit score.  Any revolving acct that has more then 50% of the balance used will impact your credit score

question_title: is there a time limit for a creditor to initiate bad report on your credit? [SEP] question_content: what if a company is bought out, can the purchasing company replace the initial bad debt report with a new report date to extend the 7 years? [SEP] best_answer: Credit reports are reported for 7 years, beginning on the day of default.  They can not be restarted, but many collection agencies will try.  They simply change the date on the report.  Many consumers don't even realize it.  \n\nGotta keep your records.

question_title: AVON Reps. How do you find a downline? (south carolina)? [SEP] question_content: I've just started in Leadership in South Carolina, I've been selling AVON for about 7 campaigns now, and I'm finding it impossible to find a downline, everyone I know buys from me with no interest in selling. Are there any other Reps out there with some quality suggestions? Please Help. [SEP] best_answer: First, have you purchased your BA/Leadership kit?  It has wonderful ideas on how to recruit future representatives.  Recruiting is NOT easy.  For every one yes, you may receive 10 no's.  

Make sure you practice your 30-second commercial until you've got it down without a stumble.

Ask the person who signed you up or your DM to go out recruiting with you.  

Use the power of 3 EVERY DAY.

Most important, make sure that you are having fun and let your potential recruits know that you love your job.

question_title: How can I find out if property was left for me by someone and I was never notified? [SEP] question_content: While checking the record of deeds for another property, I put in my name out of curiosity and it says a house was left to someone with my name same middle initial and all. 

When i told my mom she said the house was located on the same block where my father lived years ago. How could i find out if the grantee name is mine or just a coincidence without the people in the house finding out?

The property was listed as trustees deed one year and lis pendens another year exact same pin number. What do both mean? The treasurers office has the house listed but when i checked for the owners name only a p.o. box was given with no full name and two initials.

If the house was left to me, and i was never notified, could one of my father's children or someone else have been given rights to it? The grantor is a bank, and i have had no contact with my dad.

There was another named listed with mine on the trustees deed information. My mother says my father had a son with that same name. [SEP] best_answer: Ok, well to start, you'd have to check back in the title (public records of the county where the property is located) to see if the property was part of a probate.  

A trustees deed means the house was foreclosed on.  (The number you're referring to is called an APN number by the way  :)

Go back in the county records and see what information you can get from the recorded documents.  If there is a title insurer listed on the most recent deed, try to contact them.  If nothing else, the information you receive may be able to lead you to an attorney who handled your fathers estate and you can ask questions from there.

question_title: Salary Certificate Format? [SEP] question_content: I suppose to obtain salary certificate from my company, I need format for same [SEP] best_answer: There need be no standard form. What is important is that the certificate should show the figures under two heads:-

1. Pay and allowances.

(Under this head, you must show the amounts you are entitled to get, from the employer. And finally, show the Gross Salary figure, which will be the sum total of all the figures.)

2. Deductions.

(under this head, show all the figures of sum that are required to be deducted from your salary, like Income and other taxes to be deducted at source, instalments of loan/advance repayable by you, provident fund contributions by you etc. At the end of the col. you must show the sum total of the deductions.
 At, last, you must show the net salary to be paid to the employee, which is the gross salary minus the total deductions.

question_title: is there a code in the bible? [SEP] question_content: i read the book decoding the bible and it scared me.  how true is the coding of the bible?  and why have so many of the codes been true. [SEP] best_answer: Most definately not.  Here's why.  First of all, when you go to the bookstore and bye a book named 'the Bible', you're buying a translation of an anient text. By its very nature, a translation is not the original, thus any anient codes woud be lost by the simple fact that it is translated.  Next, the Bible is very old, and was written before the age of computers, so when you needed a new Bible, it had to be written by hand.  Mistakes were no doubt made, along with mistranslations.  Again, more of any ancient code would be lost.  Finally, there are today several flavors of the Bible floating around.  Do a Yahoo! Search for, say John 3:16 and you'll find at least 4 'versions' .  Essentially the same text and meaning, but one might have a comma, or the other may use an archaic form of spelling as opposed to modern.  Thus, any code that depends on character placement would be lost the instant you insert an extraneous coma or a different spelling.  Last, the reason many of these 'codes' appear to be true, is because people are very open to interpretation.  Further, the codes themselves have been found mostly by using powerful computers with complex  search algorithms.  Given a sufficiently manipulative search pattern, even a desktop computer can cull words and phrases out of a book that are in 'a code'.  Case in point, my friends and I wrote a program in ADA (a computer language) that could find 'codes' in random texts.  We even manipulated my college report card to reveal 'you will fail', which was 'hidden'.  Of course we had to run the report card through a dozen algoritms, but as soon as we 'found' one that worked we called it a 'code'.

question_title: how to build 2 wheel robot? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: To make a 2 wheel robot, you first investigate the principles of vertical balance of a subject. To determine the balance of bipedal robots or planes, gyroscopes are used. In past gyroscopes were large mechanical devices, but now there very small electronical gyroscopes that you can easily find via internet.

The second step is using of signals coming from gyroscope to find balance. If your robot tends to fall forward you should make sudden small move to forward too and vice versa.

You should tend a bit forward while making forward motion and vice versa, too.

I hope you can do what you want to do.

question_title: Office hazard improvement? [SEP] question_content: G'DAY FROM AUSTRALIA! 

How would you improve safety hazards in the office? Best Answer will be chosen if more information is given. Thank you

AUSTRALIA [SEP] best_answer: Like any other environment you start with a risk assessment that leads to a target of 'risks' that need addressed (removed or reduced).  Like any other risk management system the assessments need to be review regularly and immediately if the environment changes.

The operationally most important step is staff training which ensures everyone is aware of their individual responsibility for their, and other persons, safety.

Hope that helps

question_title: I quit  two of my part time jobs to get a temp full time job but they told me it lasts 6 mths. What do I do? [SEP] question_content: When I passed all the tests I don't remember hearing it would be a 6 month assignment. When you think temporary you think ok iif I do good they'll keep me. But now I'm shocked because I'm afraid I won't have an income in 6 months. I was told if I do good I'll be put on a good list and they decide what to do from there. Yikes. Any suggestions? What should I do? HELP! I'm trying to rent out a place but now I may not be able to. [SEP] best_answer: There are no guarantees with a temp job.  Lots of companies dangle the carrot of permanent employment to keep their temps in line.  They may or may not hire you permanently.

From being a recruiter, I can tell you this.  If you work hard, don't miss work, get good reports from your supervisor, the temp service will find you another job when this one ends.  Just be careful of becoming a permanent temp, that does happen.

Work for a few months, increase your skills, then, while still working, look for a permanent job if it is obvious that your temp assignment is not going to go permanent.

Good luck & congrats on the raise!

question_title: Why do permenent markers have such a bad smell? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: It is not the dye or pigment; it is the solvent used.  As the solvent evaporates the ink dries.  The dried ink has no smell.

Good Luck!

question_title: What legal rights do I have as an internet shopper and the supplier doesnt supply the correct goods? [SEP] question_content: I purchased three off road motorbikes from an importer who advertized them on the internet. They advertized the motorbikes as 125 cc bikes but when we took delivery of the bikes we had various faults on the bikes that made them dangerous as they failed to stop when required. I took the bikes to our local bike expert and was informed that the bikes were only 107 cc. I sent over a dozen emails and thirty phone call and the company failed to respond to any off them. They finally got in contact with me after extensive intervention from our local trading standards and stated they would replace the motorbikes for the correct ones we paid for. I explained that due to thier miss-managment and very poor customer relations and over nine months of trying to sort out this mess, my children had used the bikes. The manager of customer complaints finally collected the three bikes and said the new ones will follow but they have not responded to any of my calls or emails, so we have now got nothing. [SEP] best_answer: Get Trading Statndards in again. Or ask at the CAB.

question_title: if you quit claim your house can you still take a reverse mortgage? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: you must be on title to do a Reverse Mortgage.  Also, only those on the Reverse may be on title while it is in place.

Reverse Mortgages are great options for those with small fixed incomes and equity in their homes.  The borrower can access the equity, never make a payment as long as they live in the home, and maintain full title to the home.

Before Reverse Mortgages, one would have to sell a home to use the equity without payment - but then they had to buy another home.

Upon the borrower's passing the loan must be settled.  heirs generally have 3 months to decide on a plan, but can get extensions depeding on circumstances.  Sale of the home or refinance are the most common ways to pay off the loan (just like a regualar mortgage) and the remaining equity goes to the estate or heirs etc.

question_title: what does a manager do in a business? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: On the basis that you are serious, and why should you not be here is an answer!

A 'boss' is someone who sees that everything is done without doing anything himself

A 'team-leader' is someone who sees that everything is done without doing everything

A 'worker' is someone who see that as much is done as is necessary to keep his job.

A 'dosser' is someone who does as little as is necessary to do his job.

A 'manager' is [supposed to be] someone who keeps them all happy.

question_title: how long does amend take to return through mail I mailed in Feb it's May now? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: IRS Amended Returns take 8-12 weeks for processing.  If it has been more than 6 weeks since you filed, you can call the general information line at 1-800-829-1040 from 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM. Monday through Friday.  Let them know you have filed an amended return and you just want to verify that they received it.  Do not try and check it on the website or by calling the refund hotline at 1-800-829-1954.  Those updates will only give you information on the inital filing of your return and not any amendments.  Also, the update info will only show current year returns and not any previous years.

question_title: I have been cheated on the internet. I was defrauded over the internet. Can someone help me? [SEP] question_content: Hello. My name is Sunny(Jasnain Singh). A person emailed me some days ago saying he works for an Art gallery in England. He wanted to cash his payments here in US $'s and keep 10% of it and send the rest through Western Union or Moneygram. The first payment I sent was not picked up, but the checks came out to be counterfeit. I have returned that money to the bank because my account was in -. But I've sent one more payment and it has been picked up and now the person wont contact me. If I dont get the money back, my account will be in - again, and its around -2000.00$'s and I will be doomed. How can I resolve this. Im afraid if I file a complaint on Internet Fraud website then they might call my house and ask me all sorts of questions. Please anyone help me. I am very worried. Thank you. [SEP] best_answer: Hate to say this - but you're screwed bro. There is not a damn thing you can do about it - you gave them the money, plain and simple. especially since it is across international borders...

Listen up people - if the "deal" sounds too good to be true,thats because IT IS! No one from Africa wants to split $10M with you if you send your bank acct info. No one wants you to cash their checks and keep 10%. Get real - dont be a fool. The reason that these con games work is because people are generally GREEDY - if you werent in such a hurry to make the free cash, you would have thought about it for a minute. You got what you deserved. You got fooled by a con man becuse you were gullible to believe that he really wanted you to cash checks. 

Chalk it up to experience and DONT DO IT AGAIN.

question_title: How do you stuff a human being? [SEP] question_content: I've heard of stuffing turkeysss. But not chicken or horses or cows. Or anything else. Most importantly, I just wanna know how to stuff human beings. And I don't mean by them eating so much food. I mean how do you stuff them like a turkey. :) [SEP] best_answer: Simple. Firstly, take a scalpel and cut from the anus to the base of the neck....then remove the spine from the base of the neck to the tail bone.  After doing this you'll need to remove all the internal organs....Of course leaving the heart & liver is good for taste and keeps that "scary" factor in the meal.  Then, take two loaves of bread, a bag of croutons, two  bags of dried cranberries, some cut up parsley, celery and parsnip and through the cut in the back shove all these things in using a small gardening shovel.  You want to make sure you don't put the bread in all at once as putting it in little at a time is best.  After this, use cat gut to suture the cut and throw it in a kiln for about six hours.  Your human will come out soft at first, but let it cool for about 30 minutes and it'll be good to eat!!  It's best with human baby feet and marshmellows as a garnish.  God Bless us Everyone!!   be well, jack

question_title: Rephrasing my "curse words" question....? [SEP] question_content: Ok, I got a lot of good answers from many people, but it really didnt answer my question, so lemme rephrase:
Who ever said that the "f" word was the mother load of all "curse words?"  Whose to say that 1000's of years ago the word "goodness" wasn't a curse word?  

I guess what I'm asking is, are there really such things as curse words, or has man come up with these no-say words just to be stupid?  Is it something that we are just taught from our parents? or is there some actual logic behind it?

If anyone can give me something realistic on "cursinig" then I'd be apt not to use these words.  But, as of right now, I do not believe that there are actual curse words, and therefore, I use them.

(I appologize for the many questions, but they all really boil down to the same one!) [SEP] best_answer: There are two ways "society" trys to control its own behaviour in order to prevent utter chaos; The first is by imposing a legal code, or a set of laws that "everyone" has agreed are things you should be punished for doing, like killing other people or stealing stuff.  The other set of rules is the more arbitrary one of a "moral code".  It is within this second set of unenforced (and generally unenforceable) rules that definitions of what is and isn't cursing develop.  Regardless of what anyone tries to tell you, morality is entirely a cultural construct.  There is nothing but opinion that makes one word bad and another acceptable.  You can say "fudge you!" or "f*ck you!" will equal vehemence and mean exactly the same thing, but one will get you kicked out of WalMart.

It does not really make any sense, but if you want to get ahead in this world, the easiest way to do it is to go along with the morality of whatever society you happen by birth to be a part of.  These "rules" and acceptable behaviours serve as a model of behaviour that is supposed to make everyone less "uncomfortable", so you are right, "curse" words is a completely made-up notion.

On the subject of what is acceptable to some societies but not to others, you might enjoy this one VERY strange example:

http://www.bellaonline.com/articles/art38424.asp

Try putting THAT in a nativity scene in the US!

question_title: What is the mythology of the black boa ? [SEP] question_content: the anaconda from peru, south america and related snake mythology [SEP] best_answer: There are a lot of myths about the anaconda, it depends in the ethnic background of who's telling the story. So there are *lots* of stories about anacondas.
In Peru, one of the most popular is the Yacumama's story.
It is said that the Yacumama (yacu = water and mama = mother in the native language) is an enormous anaconda that lives in flooded tropical forests and its the forest protector or 'mother'. It is always sleeping, in the bottom of the river or 'cocha' (lake), but when the forest is disturbed, it awakes to a nasty monster that would make 'disappear' the nuisance.
Some illegal loggers and hunters are afraid of it.
=)

question_title: Gay life in Lubbock, TX? [SEP] question_content: I am a first time novelist writing a novel set in Lubbock, texas. It is about a spunky, rebellious 16-year old girl who falls in love with a quiet, artistic girl at her school. So my novel can be as realistic as possible, what is it like for gays and lesbians who live in Lubbock? From what I've heard it is a pretty conservative town. Are people there very religious? Is there a high incidence of violence against LGBT people? any information would be great. Thanks! [SEP] best_answer: I live in Lubbock. I am a straight man who agrees with your idea's about the town. It is everything you would think Lubbock to be. Very religious. Very closed minded. There is so much religion in this town that if you were to just walk in the city limits and breath the air of righteousness in Lubbock, you would be saved. Forget getting dunked in holy water. This city is so conservative and religious that if you live here for a minimum of 3 weeks, you will automatically get a VIP pass to the pearly gates. St.Peter will let you go on up to the front of the line. He will look at you and say " (your name), you had to put up with hypocrisy, closed mindedness and bigotry in your tenure at Lubbock. go ahead. The master will see you in a moment" I do not know too many gays, but I bet it would be very difficult to be one in Lubbock. I would imagine that they develop a strong shell, if they survive Lubbock. Sorry,I didn't mean to ramble on.

question_title: Why do blacks have english last names if their ancestors most probable came from Africa and not from England? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: When slave owners "bought" African slaves, they "changed" their African names to "good" Christian names.  African slaves were not given an option to keeping their family names or naming traditions; in many instances they weren't able to decide their own children's names .  When the slaves were set free and able to chose their own names, they didn't know what their original African family name  was.  Many of them continued to use the slave owners name because that was what they were accustomed to.  Some African-Americans have rejected what they consider to be slave names and have adopted either Arabic or African names.

question_title: Do you think I should take my g/f with me on Mother's day? [SEP] question_content: My step-mom does not like the fact that I am a bisexual woman, but I really like my partner. Her own mom lives too far away for her to visit. I want my family to get used to the fact that I want this relationship to work, but is this the wrong way to do this? I am 29 years old and do not live in the same house as my folks. [SEP] best_answer: I think I would find another time to introduce your partner to your step mom. It is mothers day, and not the right time to spring something like this on her. You did say that your step mom doesn't like the fact that you are a bisexual woman. You didn't say how the rest of your relationship with her goes. \n\n Make the day about your step mom, and set aside another day entirely where you can slowly start to integrate your partner into the relationship you have with your step mom. I am all about the two of them meeting, getting to know eachother....because this will help your step mom see that you are simply in love..and it doesn't matter with what sex. However, it would be very disrespectful to take her to your step moms on mothers day. And your step mom would be fully in her rights to be upset. Pick your battles and you'll have an easier time fighting them.

question_title: what is the oldest language in the world and why do we all not speak it? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: Linguists do not know. The oldest recorded WRITTEN language is Sumerian. Before that no languages were written (as far as we know) and therefore, by definition, left traces only in the spoken languages which they evolved into.
It is now pretty much agreed that Homo Sapiens evolved in Africa and spread from there. Anthropologically speaking, the 'oldest' races of humans are - quite possibly - the Khoi-San peoples of Southern Africa. Their languages have features that linguists speculate make them likely to be extremely old:
1. They are extremely complex
2. They have (phonetic) systems that are significantly more complex than any other languages. (Among these features are the wide varety of speech sounds - up to 147 as opposed to 44 of Standard English. These include many 'click' sounds.)
The Khoi-San peoples were displaced by later herdsmen migrations and invasions over the last thousands of years and survive in small pockets in Botswana and elsewhere).

question_title: what characterizes the western world? [SEP] question_content: what are the Europeans lifestyles,thoughts, values and interests [SEP] best_answer: I think the main thing that characterizes the western world in comparison to the eastern is the idea of the sanctity of the individual.  Possibly because of Christianity, or possibly for more esoteric reasons, individualism has been more important that collectivism throughout western history.  Freedom is more important that tradition and structure.  These are basic judeo-christian values which spring from a belief in free will and the responsibility of the individual to live up to a moral standard that started with the Ten Commandments.  Coupled with curiosity, imagination, ambition and even greed, it has created much of what we consider to be western culture.

question_title: what does saleba mean in lebanese? [SEP] question_content: its my last name and id like to know what it means? [SEP] best_answer: this is a last name common in syria & lebanon - HOWEVER it does not come from the Arabic language.   In Arabic the word for "CROSS" is SALIB - not Saliba.  


Saliba comes directly from Aramaic language which was the language of Syria & lebanon before the Arab invasion.   SALIBA  means "cross" in Aramaic.   there is no Arabic word of SALIBA.

some families in Lebanon & syria had this last name when the Arabs invaded & conquered those countries.  they simply kept the name as it is .  Remember - it is not Arabic - but is Aramaic  !!!    This surname goes back to the time when the Lebanese people spoke Aramaic and not Arabic.   Important you should know that.

question_title: Atheist Support for Global Morality Vote? [SEP] question_content: For atheists:  The world continues to produce flawed societies (Nazi Germany, Rhwanda) where a majority rises with a distorted collective conscience of right and wrong--and atrocities occur.  To systematize a code of morality, would you support a global vote on right and wrong?  This concensus could educate those with damaged personal conscience, and reduce the capacity of powerful personalities to sway societies into violent value systems.  "Universal Truth" is off the table for the atheist--so shouldn't we have a worldwide vote to at least establish a global definition of right and wrong?  Majority rule is all there is, so wouldn't a global morality vote be the best? [SEP] best_answer: Why would this majority rule then be correct? As in, who gives you the right over someone else? You'll force them? That doesn't make sense. Beyond this, I'd love to see a transcultural model that actually works. It won't. Because guess what? Are you going to let everyone practice religion? Whatever one they want? Even if it goes against your code? If you don't, this won't work. Also, if you apply certain moral codes, and someone doesn't ascribe to them, so what? What are you gonna do? Punish them for bad morals? If you don't, then what was the purpose in the first place? If you do, then you have become an oppressive society. And before you become one of those you had better be sure you know what you're doing. Another point, because everyone believes it doesn't make it right. What if you wanted to amend it later on to say that killing is OK? Would it then be OK? If you have a universal standard of morality, then it can't change, otherwise what's the point? If it can't change, then majority rule is not the determining factor of universal moral guidelines. So what makes your first majority any more special than the ones to come? This is illogical, impractical and unfeasible at best.
